title: Add support for Dynamic Kernel Module Support (DKMS)
body: Would like to use DKMS as one of my primary use cases for Bash on Windows is using Vagrant to run VirtualBox to run tests.

comments.body: Alternatively, you can route all VirtualBox api calls in WSL directly to a VirtualBox running on Windows itself. As I think supporting DKMS would be a much larger effort.
I've been trying really hard to get virtualbox/vagrant working with no luck so far.  Are you able to correctly run vagrant without dkms?
It'll be also nice to have an integration with existing chef workflows as there are some scenarios where the different line endings will break a Vagrant/Chef setup on Windows.
